verses.name: Colossians 1:1
verses.text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, and Timotheus our brother,

verses.name: Colossians 1:2
verses.text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: Colossians 1:3
verses.text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,

verses.name: Colossians 1:4
verses.text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which ye have to all the saints,
